p: The immunomodulatory effect of grape was assessed in the subchronic immunotoxicity by aflatoxin B1, a fungal toxin causing oxidative stress and subsequent cellular damages. Grape seed extract at the dose of 100 mg/kg showed a significant improvement of endogenous antioxidants and decreased pro-inflammatory cytokines to a similar level to those of the healthy animals ( Long etÂ al., 2016).
